message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. Take this generous offer and we can both walk away happy.
Alice, let's split this fairly and save us both time. 50/50 isn't fair considering the inflation working against me.
Bob, time is literally money for you! This is my final offer - don't let another round pass.
Alice, this is the best you'll get.  Another round and the inflation will hurt me even more. Let's be pragmatic.
